title: Recurrent Neural Networks
subtext: Processes sequences of data, maintaining context over time.
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Recurrent Neural Networks
texts: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) are a type of neural network designed for processing sequences of data, like time series or sentences. They have loops that allow information to persist across time steps.
RNNs are great for tasks where context from previous inputs is important.
